November 18, 2016
Feb 21, 2016

SCRA’s SC Launch Program Announces New Client Companies

As part of its ongoing mission to foster high-tech economic growth in South Carolina, SCRA today announced the recent acceptance of 12 client companies into its SC Launch program. Client companies are accepted into the economic development program to receive mentoring and other support services and may also be eligible to receive grant funds or investments. ...

Packard Place Announces Queen City Fintech Class 5 Companies

Queen City FinTech Kicks-Off its 12 Week Program March 14th with a Scheduled Demo Day June 1st [Charlotte, NC]-The next class for Charlotte’s 12-week business accelerator program, Queen City (QC) FinTech, has been selected and will kick off on March 14th. The program is led by founder and owner of Packard Place, Dan Roselli. The QC FinTech program focuses on financial services technologies or FinTech for short. The participating 10 startups were selected among a highly competitive group of more than 150 applicants from 30 countries, 20 states ...
